description.general: A small vessel originally built to hunt wildlife along rivers and coastlines.
A small maneuverable ship that can ram targets and cause flooding damage.
More durable and capable of taking sustained damage, this ship specializes in bracing against incoming fire.
A ship capable of supporting other ships in the thick of combat.
A ship specialized in dealing fire and burning damage, before spreading the chaos to nearby ships.
With the right weapons equipped, this ship is able to stand toe-to-toe with multiple enemies.
A larger ship capable of taking on multiple enemies when properly equipped.
A ship with increased durability and holding its ground in a fight. It specializes in bracing against incoming fire.
A swift ship that is able to ram singular targets and cause flooding damage.
A ship specialized in dishing out fire damage and burning its targets. It is also able to target multiple enemies in close proximity.
A ship that excels at aiding other ships in danger by rendering effective repairs.
A support ship that excels in deploying buoys that can shift the battle in their favor.
A resilient juggernaut suited for distracting opponents, withstanding damage, and creating opportunities for allies to engage or escape.
A fast, maneuverable vessel with a knack for hunting down fleeing ships.
Excels at devastating broadside attacks, turning every barrage into an explosive reaction, wreaking havoc on fleets and structures in the Red Isle.
A large ship with unmatched defenses. It radiates a powerful aura that fortifies allies. A product of Compagnie ingenuity and advanced materials from Europe.
Excels at dealing damage over time and is especially efficient in combat with Toxic weapons.
